TECFA's little Cocoon Page
This page contains examples of using Cocoon, links to Cocoon/XSP documentation and general XML/XSLT links.

Cocooncenter
A site completely dedicated to Cocoon, providing tutorials and how-to articles written by Cocoon users. The articles - and other issues - can be discussed in a forum.

CocoonHive.org
CocoonHive.org maintainings a catalog of articles on Best Practices, Use Cases and Success Stories.

Cocoon Lists Weekly Summary
Cocoon-URL is a weekly summary of interesting links posted to the mailing lists of the Cocoon project

s1.title: How to get listed
s1.p: If you do not find your site here, make sure you tell us. Enter a meaningful title after the words "Link: Site:" in the subject, provide a short summary of your site, and do not forget to tell us the URL. You could also follow the Contributing page to make it easier for everyone.
